summary:
A new Fort for your Pleasure, With all the crafting accessories for potions or armors, complete with kitchen, display area plenty of storage guards & merchants and a few surprises...
Idea for use with Tundra Defense, Optional files with no NPC\'s or outside clutter.
descriptionHtml:
Charlies great great ancestor called.. Charlie created this wonderful Fort for his family and him self, But sadly they all died and no one was there to look after it. Now it is yours...

With plenty of storage, Beautiful views and every thing you could need to defend your self.
And you own horse with more stamina!

There is now an optional file to download for use with Tundra Defense mod which you can download here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22330

Added a optional file where the horse does not follow you around, he just goes back to where you found him.

Features:

Guard Patrol
Fast travel marker
Navmeshed
Kitchen with Merchant
Blacksmith merchant
Book shelves to store all your favorite books
Armor rack
Mannequins  
Alchemy room
Display room
Staff Quarters
Crafting Area with: 
Workbench 
Grindstone
Smelter
Forge
& Stables
And a secret room...

Updates:

V .2
Replaced Cicero as he was just annoying
Fixed weapon rack facing wrong way
Gave Merchants some money
Gave guards some spells
Horse now has a basic follow package
Fixed the steps outside as these were to high to walk up

Still needs fixing:
Flags?
NPC Dialog 
Conflict with SkyBirds to do with faction, Until I know what faction it uses I cannot do anything

To install please place file in \\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

To uninstall please take it out.

Bugs: please let me know if you find any.

Credits:
Many thanks to mcclaudeagle for help with this mod play testing and stuff

I might change the name of the fort any ideas welcome.

If you like please either leave comment feedback give endorsement or even take a picture in your new home and post it on here, Thank you for looking at my mod I hope you enjoy.
I\'m not very good at doing a read me so I hope this is OK for you.....
author: chazzee23

files.name: Optional file with no horse following
